Why would you nerf Knight's vow's health which is very important to the supports that use it just because it's being abused by junglers? 
Why not instead switch the partnered armour and the static armour around so that it gives 400 health and 20 armour and then grants 40 armour when near your partner? this would stop junglers from abusing it just for the stats but still keep the health priority on tank support items which is necessary for them because of Locket's super shitty lack of synergy with itself and Zeke's, causing support tanks to need to stack health from any other item they can get in order to make it anywhere near as effective as Redemption.

"Why not instead switch the partnered armour and the static armour around so that it gives 400 health and 20 armour and then grants 40 armour when near your partner?"
The short/quick answer is that then you'd have an item that is (situationally) worse than it's components.
You buy a 40 armor chain vest, and upgrade it, now you only have 20 armor sometimes. Very "feels bad".
(And to note, it used to be 20+40 but it also used to build out of a 15 armor item, they changed the build path to be less wonky)

That's true, thank you, though there's bound to be some way they could nerf the item's abuses while supporting the items proper usage. 
My idea may not be the answer but I'm sure they can come up with something. Support tanks have been struggling up until recently and its still only a select few who are good; their item paths are severely limited, and certain items are seen as "essential" to ALL supports, so nerfing one of their few decent choices may hurt them more than the junglers abusing the item. I will note that it wasn't as heavily abused before they changed it, so I was kinda right in that it would probably help against abuses. lol
Thanks for the civil and informative response mate, that's rare on the forums.

Does anyone else find Jinx's anti-personnel kit conflicting with her "Crazy Queen of Destruction" concept? She's not supposed to be interested in killing people she just likes to destroy things and sometimes people get hurt in the process, but never intentionally, but her kit is focused on killing people and doesn't have anything to do with destruction.
I'd love to see her focus on damage to structures (turrets), because the only real demolisher champ in the game is Ziggs and Jinx really should be a demolisher style of champ as well. The ADC is supposed to be all about destroying them towers after all. 
I'd like if Fishbones dealt additional damage to turrets but dealt slightly reduced damage to champs, or maybe her crit rate could amplify her tower damage with Fishbones. Also her ult is nothing special and feels like just another bland long range marksman execute, and it certainly doesn't match her concept; what about letting her ult hit towers, executing them if they're below a certain health threshold and damaging nearby enemies, if the tower is above the health threshold when it hit's it just deals a decentish chunk of damage.
I'm not a Jinx main, I don't like her simplicity and lack of a unique identity compared to some of the other marksmen so as much as I want to like her I just can't. I actually main support but I'm getting so very tired of how bland ADC's are, from a support standpoint they're mostly the same, except they all either have mobility or CC other than that, they pretty much all do the same thing, click for damage; so I'd like to see more variety between the ADC's so they actually feel significantly different to play with as opposed to just variations of Ashe or Ezreal.
